metadata.synopsis: Non-critical path. Unless the player has snapped him out of it, the boy will be enchanted and wanting to get closer to the source of the song.
metadata.how_to_trigger: occurs during regular den statein reCon: teleport S_DEN_CharmedKidwalk towards water - dialogue triggers

24.speaker: Mirkon
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: The gnome isn't looking at the player, but in the direction the singing comes from.NodeContext: in awe, entranced. Trying not to disturb the singer.

78.speaker: Narrator
78.text: *Your favourite drownings all take place in shallow water... Just a slice of the ankle tendons...*

82.speaker: Player
82.text: You shouldn't be standing out in the water. It's dangerous.

88.speaker: Mirkon
88.text: Don't you hear it? It's so peaceful.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: I don't hear anything. Come back to shore.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: Focus and try to hear what he hears.

83.speaker: Narrator
83.text: *A sweet melody beckons you. It vibrates with magic - a harpy's charm.*

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Focus your will. Improvise a magical shell to dampen the music.

9.speaker: Narrator
9.text: *A sweet melody plays above the waves, beckoning you - drowning out all logical thought.*
9.context: InternalNodeContext: SFX: You should be able to hear the song more clearly.

85.speaker: Player
85.text: Close your eyes and listen to the song.

28.speaker: Narrator
28.text: *The suffocating yearning suddenly fades as the spell breaks. You are free.*
28.context: InternalNodeContext: SFX: You should be able to hear the song more clearly.

3.speaker: Mirkon
3.text: No, no. It's just a bit of water. I only want to listen. Just a little closer...
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: The halfling berely glances at you even when he gets mad.NodeContext: He's not concerned even tough you told him he'd drown.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: '... Her man would not listen, he thought it tall tales, until he rubbed up against all of her scales!'

60.speaker: Mirkon
60.text: Auch! My ears! Wait - why am I wet?
60.context: NodeContext: He's just been shaken from his stupor because someone else shouted over the harpy.

42.speaker: Harpy
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harpy flies in and perches menacingly on the rock above the players. Should look grandiose and cool.NodeContext: Feral bird-woman - rage and hunger, you just took away her prey.

36.speaker: Harpy
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: The other harpies descend on the rocks around us.NodeContext: Angry, and viscious. You  you just took away her prey.

94.speaker: Mirkon
94.text: Shhh! You're ruining it. I just want to - just a little closer...
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: The child berely glances at you even when he gets mad.InternalNodeContext: SFX: we could hear a bit of another song, but the harpy song is stronger.NodeContext: He's annoyed that you are trying to interrupt the song, then adresses the harpy again.

96.speaker: Player
96.text: Sing: 'There once was a lady who met with a merrow, and tried to disclose it to her foolish fellow...'

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Drown out the harpies with a ROAR.

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *Your chest fills with yearning. You want to get closer - you need to get closer.*
2.context: InternalNodeContext: SFX: You should be able to hear the song more clearly.

21.speaker: Narrator
21.text: *Just a few more steps... and you can lose yourself in that sweet song...*
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: The other harpies descend on the rocks around the water.InternalNodeContext: SFX: You should be able to hear the song more clearly.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Focus by singing: 'There once was a lady who met with a merrow, and tried to disclose it to her foolish fellow...'

30.speaker: Player
30.text: Pick his pockets while he's distracted.

91.speaker: Narrator
91.text: *You lift the child's gold pouch as he stumbles deeper into the water, oblivious.*

38.speaker: Astarion
38.text: You villain! I didn't know you had it in you.
38.context: NodeContext: Shocked at first, then a little coy/even flirty.

89.speaker: Shadowheart
89.text: Nicely done. I hope you're intending to share.
89.context: NodeContext: A discreet aside, admiring the player's successful pickpocketing of a gnome.

14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Harpy flies in and perches menacingly on the rock, while she keeps singing

19.speaker: Mirkon
19.text: Yes, everything's gonna be fine... once I get there...

5.speaker: Narrator
5.text: *You slip your hand into his pocket but find nothing.*

66.speaker: Mirkon
66.text: Don't touch me! You won't stop me! Just a little closer...
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: the player reaches for the child's pocket, but he jerks away, then shouts this line.NodeContext: angy and still under trance.

44.speaker: Mirkon
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: The gnome isn't looking at the player, but in the direction the singing comes from.NodeContext: in awe, entranced. Trying not to disturb the singer.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: Focus your will. Improvise a magical shell to dampen the music.

74.speaker: Mirkon
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Not really turning towards the player while he's talking to the player. He keeps looking for the voice while he talks.NodeContext: Low voice, is trying not to disturb the singer, but is a little irritated with the player.
